rows.label: qst202014_msg001
rows.name: I got what you asked for!

rows.label: qst202014_msg003
rows.name: We hid one in Superbia and one in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202014_msg004
rows.name:
I see, so we buried them separately, 
one in each place.

rows.label: qst202014_msg005
rows.name:
Thank you very much for 
bringing them back.

rows.label: qst202014_msg007
rows.name:
Now, there's one last thing I'd like
you to do for me.

rows.label: qst202014_msg009
rows.name:
Yes, I want you to deliver 
these bracers to my daughter and son.

rows.label: qst202014_msg010
rows.name:
They've each got their own families
now, out living in different nations.

rows.label: qst202014_msg011
rows.name: Alright, let's see this through to the end.

rows.label: qst202014_msg012
rows.name: I see, I see. Thank you.

rows.label: qst202014_msg013
rows.name:
My son's name is Artus. He should be
in Alba Margen in Superbia.

rows.label: qst202014_msg014
rows.name:
And my daughter's called Noelia.
She's living in Fons Maim, in Invidia.

rows.label: qst202014_msg015
rows.name:
I trust you to get the bracers to them.
And of course, I'll be sure to reward
you handsomely when you're done!
